name: Music Player
description: Comprehensive music player with song playing, playlist management, and music control capabilities

tools.name: play_song
tools.description: Play a specific song by name, artist, or search query

query.description: Song name, artist, or search query (e.g., "Bohemian Rhapsody", "Queen", "classic rock")

tools.name: play_playlist
tools.description: Play a playlist or create a new one with multiple songs

name.description: Playlist name or "create new" to create a new playlist

songs.description: Array of song names or search queries for the playlist

tools.name: control_music
tools.description: Control music playback (play, pause, stop, next, previous, volume)

value.description: For volume: 0-100, for seek: position in seconds

tools.name: search_music
tools.description: Search for songs, artists, albums, or genres

type.description: Type of music to search for

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: get_now_playing
tools.description: Get information about the currently playing song and player status

tools.name: set_repeat_mode
tools.description: Set repeat mode for music playback

mode.description: Repeat mode: none (no repeat), one (repeat current song), all (repeat playlist)

examples.prompt: Create a playlist with my favorite songs
examples.response: Calling play_playlist with { name: 'My Favorites', songs: ['Bohemian Rhapsody', 'Imagine', 'Billie Jean'] }
